title: Mini-Ep 40: How To Feel Okay When Life Is Not
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 40: How To Feel Okay When Life Is Not
itunes:subtitle: This week, Kate and Doree get a bunch of hair loss tips and recommendations from listeners. They also hear from a listener who wants to learn about pop culture after growing up in a cult, and offer advice to a woman feeling despondent and isolated whil...
description:
This week, Kate and Doree get a bunch of hair loss tips and recommendations from listeners. They also hear from a listener who wants to learn about pop culture after growing up in a cult, and offer advice to a woman feeling despondent and isolated while going through IVF and pregnancy loss as she approaches her 40th birthday.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Poshmark - Get $5 off your first purchase when you use the invite code DOREESHA when you sign up (it's also Doree's closet name!)
  • Fabletics - Visit Fabletics.com/forever35 to get 2 leggings for only $24
  • Follain - Go to follain.com/forever35 to try the Clean Essentials Kit for $22, and enter code FOREVER35 for free shipping
  • Sing A Different Tune - Enter promo code FOREVER35 to get 30% off singing lessons from our friend Amber Petty


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
